sentences.sContent: We were taught how to curtsy to the Queen.
sentences.sCn: 有人教我们如何向女王行屈膝礼。

words.tran: 女人行的鞠躬礼；屈膝礼

remMethod.val: curt(简略的) + sy → 一种简略的礼节 → 屈膝礼

trans.tranOther: if a woman curtsies, she bends her knees with one foot in front of the other as a sign of respect for an important person
